boost::idl::get_function_type

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class boost::idl::get_function_type< T >

Used to deduce the function signature of signals/member function pointers.

Given a class name and function or signal name, the combination of BOOST_TYPEOF() and get_function_type will return a type of the form R(ARGS) which can then be used in other templates.
